'''''Other Minds'' 24''' is the twenty-fourth issue of ''[[Other Minds]]'', a magazine devoted to ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]'' and other role playing games set in Middle-earth, published in January 2021.

==Contents==
* "Editorial"
** By [[Thomas Morwinsky]]
* "The Road Goes Ever On"
** By Thomas Morwinsky

** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "Blood in the Waters"
** By Christoph Hardebusch
* "Fourth Age of Middle-earth"
** By Viel Nast
* "Ravens and Crows"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "TOR Guide to the Lands of Lindon"
** By Andrew Laubacher
* "The Sisters and the Sea"
** By Andrew Laubacher
* "The Haunted Lake - A Shire Adventure"
** By Andrew Laubacher
* "Of Ghosts and Goblins"
** By Christoph Hardebusch
* "A Mass Abduction"
** By Andreas Erdmann
